name: Bendo's Complex in Stupidness and Destruction
name_original: Bendo's Complex in Stupidness and Destruction
description: wowzies, imagine a game about a bendy oc and other people inside of a complex wanting to murder you, this is a game about just that, a baldis basics mod about bendo and his dumbass friends and other things. just wanting to annoy the fuck out of you so much, its incredibly difficult appearing that bart is really short and you cant see him, GOOD LUCK! :)
